root.name: Newcomer
root.description: Commodore 64 RPG that has been in making for 20 years. There is no release date yet (December 2011)Official site: http://www.newcomer.hu/Developer: http://www.protovision-online.com/games/newcomer.htmMinimum system requirements:C64, or C128 in C64 mode, 1541/1571 Floppy1541 version: 12* floppy disk sidesVICE fully supported, extensively tested, no virtual floppy disk swapping, works like a native PC / Mac / Linux game
